home.desc-mns: Domains that targets your wallet address.

delete.title: Remove a token
delete.subtitle: You are about to delete a token, please enter 'DELETE' in the field below to confirm
delete.wrong-value: You must fill with 'DELETE' to confirm.
delete.bad-request: Something went wrong while deleting the token.
delete.invalid-address: Something went wrong with the token address, please try again.
delete.internal-server-error: Something went wrong while deleting the token.
delete.unknown-error: Something went wrong while deleting the token. Please try again.

success-screen.success-message: {name} ({symbol}) token is added to your wallet.

failure-screen.wrong-format: Invalid asset address format. It must start with 'AS' followed by alphanumeric characters.
failure-screen.bad-request: This asset has already been imported.
failure-screen.invalid-address: The provided address is not valid.
failure-screen.not-found: The asset with the provided address was not found in the network.
failure-screen.internal-server-error: An error occurred while trying to add the asset. Please try again later.
failure-screen.unknown-error: Oops, an unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

step2.title: Password
step2.description: Now, define your password. To maximize security, a pop up will open directly on your device via MassaStation.

step3.title: Backup
step3.description: Security is very important, we recommend backing up your account using a key pair or a .yaml file. Would you like to do it now or later?

account.corrupted-account: Your wallet file: {account} is found, but its format is unknown. Import account to use it.
account.corrupted-accounts: Your wallet files: {accounts} are found, but their format is unknown. Import accounts to use them.

sign-rules.description: Sign Rules allow you to sign operations in a simpler way by defining rules specific to a Smart Contract.
sign-rules.name: Name
sign-rules.auto-sign-tooltip: This will automatically sign operations coming from the linked contract address, without asking for your password nor your confirmation.
sign-rules.disable-password-prompt-tooltip: This will disable the password prompt for operations coming from the linked contract address, but will still require your confirmation.

errors.add: An error occurred while adding the sign rule
errors.already-exist: A similar rule already exists for account
errors.delete: An error occurred while deleting the sign rule
errors.update: An error occurred while updating the sign rule
errors.toggle: An error occurred while toggling the sign rule

send-coins.sent: Yah! You just had sent {amount} to {recipient}

errors.no-content-to-copy: There's no content to be copied
errors.account-invalid-format: The account name can't contain any special characters, and 32 characters max.

unexpected-error.title: Oops!
unexpected-error.link: Go back to the Welcome page!

send-coins.amount-to-low: Amount must be greater than zero
send-coins.fees-to-low: Fees must be greater than or equal to zero
send-coins.invalid-address: Recipient address is not a valid Massa address
send-coins.sent: Oops! Something went wrong in your transfer. Please, try again later...

receive-coins.no-link: there's no link to copy. Please, generate one!

errors.invalid-file: Unsupported file format. Please, try another file or import the account by providing private keys.

send-coins.advanced-message: You pay gas fees to reward block validators and maximize your chances to see your transaction validated. It is a tip for people that support the blockchain network.
send-coins.fee-info: {feeType} gas fees are {fee} MAS, to set custom fees head to the Advanced section on the previous step.
send-coins.account-fee-alert: If this account is new you'll be charged 0.001 MAS for blockchain storage cost.

steps.failed-timeout: Operation failed due to timeout, please retry with more fees.

placeholder.teaser-banner: Our new feature is coming soon
placeholder.teaser-transaction-page: If you're here, it's because you wanted to see your transactions! Don't panic, you'll be able to consult them in a few months!
placeholder.teaser-contacts-page: Managing your contact list for a smoother transaction management.
